netcontext-docs.description: NetContext documentation and command bundle server

// INSTALLATION INSTRUCTIONS.step1: Build the MCP servers: cd /path/to/netcontext-mcp && npm install && npm run build
// INSTALLATION INSTRUCTIONS.step3: Update the 'args' paths to match your installation location
// INSTALLATION INSTRUCTIONS.step4: Update DEVICE_USERNAME and DEVICE_PASSWORD with your credentials
// INSTALLATION INSTRUCTIONS.step5: Restart Claude Code to load the MCP servers
// INSTALLATION INSTRUCTIONS.step6: Verify with: Tools → MCP Servers → should show 'netcontext-docs' and 'netcontext-network'

// SECURITY NOTES.password_security: IMPORTANT: Store device passwords securely. Consider using SSH keys instead of passwords.
// SECURITY NOTES.alternative_auth: For SSH key auth, add 'DEVICE_PRIVATE_KEY': '/path/to/id_rsa' instead of DEVICE_PASSWORD
// SECURITY NOTES.environment_variables: For better security, use system environment variables instead of hardcoding credentials

// USAGE EXAMPLES.get_bundle: Ask Claude: 'Get the health_check bundle for hp-aruba-procurve'
// USAGE EXAMPLES.execute_commands: Ask Claude: 'Execute health check on device 192.168.1.10'
// USAGE EXAMPLES.baseline_config: Ask Claude: 'Show me the baseline access switch configuration for HP Aruba'
